question_text:
Question 18 
 
Nitrile rubber is manufactured via polymerization process. Which one of the following options is the 
CORRECT pair of monomers used in this process?  
 
[Chemical Technology, 1 Marks] 
 
(A) 
Acrylonitrile and styrene  
 
(B) 
Acrylonitrile and butadiene

GATE 2023 
 [Afternoon Session]
Chemical Engineering
PAGE
12

(C) 
Butadiene and styrene  
 
(D) 
Butadiene and isoprene  
Ans. 
(B) 
Sol. 
Acrylonitrile + Butadiene 

Nitrile Rubber
